title: High Elf
content: with the chill of the grave. It takes 1d8 Necrotic and cannot regain hit points.Dancing Lights: Create wisps of light that illuminate a 9m radius. Fire Bolt: Hurl a mote of fire that deals 1d6 Fire and creates a flammable surface. Friends: Enchant a non-hostile creature to gain advantage on Charisma checks against it.
